name: Aurafin
description: Meet Aurafin, the legendary pokemon with beautiful golden scales! This majestic creature skims through the ocean with grace and ease, its dazzling body glistening in the sun. It spends its days soaring through the waves, occasionally stopping to take a leisurely swim before twisting around and leading the sea with its graceful movements. With its powers of Hydrofury and Tackle, Aurafin is sure to leave an impression on any who cross its path.
image_prompt: Aurafin::0 a legendary water-type fish pokemon::2.5, with golden scales, in a ocean environment, aurora background, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
